execute_query: CREATE DATABASE if not exists Google_flights;
CREATE TABLE if not exists trips(id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, unique_id VARCHAR(50), date_of_scrape DATE, price INT);
CREATE TABLE if not exists airports (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, iata_code VARCHAR(50), name VARCHAR(100), city VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE if not exists facilities(id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, text VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE if not exists flights(id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, flight_num VARCHAR(50), depart_time DATETIME, depart_airport_id INT, arr_time DATETIME, arr_airport_id INT, flight_duration TIME, co2_emission VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE if not exists flights_facilities (flight_id INT, facility_id INT);
CREATE TABLE if not exists trips_flights (trip_id INT, flight_id INT, order_in_trip INT)
executemany_query: UPDATE airports SET name = %s WHERE iata_code = %s;
